item.description:
Trip Length:    2.0 hours
Difficulty:       Easy.  Total elevation gain 200 feet.
Gear Needed: Cross Country Skis and poles.  Prior experience on cross country skis is required. 
Rentals available in many locations:  One location is The Sport Loft, 113 Lunenburg St. (Rt. 2A) Fitchburg, 978-342-7362. 
Hike Leader: Richard Fallon, Er_Mobile.Service@Yahoo.com, Home is 978-400-5564

Leominster State Forest is a beautiful 4,300-acre parcel of forested land, located in the five towns of Westminster, Princeton, Leominster, Fitchburg and Sterling in North Central Massachusetts. We will be skiing on at least 12 inches of snow on unplowed jeep trails.  During this trip we will be talking about cross country skis and all the related equipment.  Please be all geared up and ready to leave promptly at the time above.  I will be arriving 10 minutes in advance to assist others with their equipment. 

Park Directions

From east or west: Take Rte. 2 to Rt. 31 South (exit 28) In Fitchburg,
2. Follow MA-31 South  2.2 mi 
3. Turn Left into parking lot (its the only on the left)  which is 20 ft before the 'Entering Princeton' road sign.
item.how_to_find_us: We are easy to find cuz its a small parking lot.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Cross Country Skiing in Leominster State Forest
